DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine intravenous bolus phenylephrine effective compare intravenous bolus norepinephrine associate crystalloid load maintain blood pressure spinal anesthetic cesarean delivery . Prevention low blood pressure show decrease nausea vomit cesarean delivery spinal anesthesia . For elective cesarean delivery , participant receive spinal anesthesia local anesthetic sufentanil . This study plan enroll 120 pregnant woman . Patients randomly assign accord computer generate system one two group .
DOC.brief_title: Intravenous Bolus Phenylephrine vs. Norepinephrine Preventing Hypotension After Spinal Anesthesia
DOC.detailed_description: This study prospective , randomize , active treatment control trial . After write informed consent obtain , study participant randomly assign use computer generate table 1 2 treatment group prior cesarean delivery . Group A consist : An intravenous bolus 0,2 mcg/Kg norepinephrine maintain systolic blood pressure ( SBP ) within 80-120 % baseline spinal . Group B consist : An intravenous bolus 100mcg phenylephrine maintain systolic blood pressure ( SBP ) within 80-120 % baseline spinal . Patients admit hold area . Baseline arterial blood pressure heart rate measure supine position , leave uterine displacement . Baseline blood pressure calculate take mean three consecutive SBP measurement take 5 minute apart . 500 mL Lactated Ringers solution administer immediately induction spinal anesthesia outflow rate 100ml per hour . The primary endpoint number provider intervention need maintain SBP within 100-120 % baseline group . The secondary endpoint nausea measure provider intervention induction spinal anesthesia , immediately follow delivery 11 point verbal rating scale ( 0 = nausea , 1 = nausea ) . Vomiting record whenever present surgical procedure . Bradycardia ( HR le 50 BPM ) treat Atropine 0.4mg IV ephedrine 3 mg - 12 mg IV bolus . Study participant receive standard spinal anesthetic consist 0.5 % hyperbaric bupivacaine ( 2 mL ) plus sufentanil ( 5 mcg ) L3-4 L4-5 . Prior surgical incision , spinal sensory level test bilateral T6-T4 dermatomal level . The patient position supine wedge place right hip avoid aortocaval compression . Both patient researcher 's assistant ( collect data ) blind administer Phenylephrine norepinephrine bolus . The study end cesarean section complete patient transfer post-operative care unit . Measured variable include systolic , diastolic mean non-invasive blood pressure , number type intervention control blood pressure , heart rate , incidence nausea vomit ( NV ) , incidence arrhythmia fetal cord blood analysis ( pH ) delivery .
